Swept Disk Solid Geometry
=========================



```
concept {
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:Radius -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:InnerRadius -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:StartParam -> IfcParameterValue
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:EndParam -> IfcParameterValue
    IfcSweptDiskSolid:StyledByItem -> IfcStyledItem
    IfcStyledItem:Name -> IfcLabel
    IfcStyledItem:Styles -> IfcSurfaceStyle
}
```
